question: Veer Dev Gulia, who has won bronze at the Junior World Wrestling Championships, is related to which freestyle category?
explanation: Veer Dev Gulia from India has won bronze in the men\'s 74 kg freestyle category at the Junior World Wrestling Championships at Tampere in Finland on August 2, 2017. Gulia finished third after beating Yamasaki Yajuro of Japan, 8-5 in the bronze medal play-off bout. Beside him, Ravinder from India has also won bronze medal in 60 kg freestyle section in the tournament.
